attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 & Save the UK from Break up & Recession
attributes.additional_details:
Scotland & Wales have already voiced their opinions both that they wish to stay within the EU, but also will look into Independance should we be taken out of the EU. 

Multiple studies have been done into the negative consequences we will face to go through with Brexit. 

The EU has introduced many protections and regulations to protect it's citizens.

Many of the current Government would reverse regulations such as food hygene, working hours, etc.
attributes.background:
The last Deal we have been given by the EU, is considerably worse than the deal we have with the EU now. We will loose many hard fought for protections, and have been predicted to go into a recession.

The Government should revoke Article 50, and renegotiate all our ties from within the EU.
